test.name: Octane#549022 - [defect]when the root portfolio in portfolio tree synced failed, we have to sync the portfolio tree correctly in the next sync
test.doc: Purpose: when the root portfolio in portfolio tree synced failed, we have to sync the portfolio tree correctly in the next sync Description: 1. prepare a portfolio tree 2. root portfolio will sync failed, check sub portfolio should sync successfully 3. update root portfolio and sync should sync successfully, check sub portfolio's parent should be updated. Function Designer: Author: Xuanyu Liu Create Date: 3/10/2023
